alert.note: Alert for Overton; Putnam (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:47PM CDT until September 25 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN OVERTON AND NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 347 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Monterey, or 9 miles south of Livingston, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Monterey, Crawford and Rickman. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 301 and 302. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
